item.title: Gu Hong Min (민거홍)
item.description: Gu Hong (Kevin) Min wants to innovate education with technology. He has over nine years of experience as an educator, and has worked with various companies, government associations, and universities to create enlightening courses. Now, he wants to do more. Through convergence of technology and education, he plans to reach a wider audience, and make a significant impact to the world. Recipient of: 2022 Mininster of Science and ICT Award, 2020 Minister of Education Award of Korea.
